title: How long has BTS been living together? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well that depends.. as a group they’ve been living together for about just over 8 years now. But- Namjoon and Yoongi have lived together the longest. They’ll be celebrating 10 years of living together in October of this year(2020)Hoseok isn’t far behind, he’s been living with them for 9 years, Jungkook for 9 years as well, though he came months after Hoseok started living in their first dorm. Jin was the last to move into the dorm, but Tae and Jimin lived there around the same so those 3 have been living with the others for about 8 years. That’s just living together, they’ve known each other for longer than they’ve lived together, for some of them they knew each other for a year or more prior to living together. Hope that helped.

They are celebrating 7 years of BTS this year, but they moved in together before their debut. Knowing Jungkook signed up to be a ig Hit trainee at 13, I'm gonna guess they've lived together for 9-10 years. I'm not sure about their current living situation, as it seems during this pandemic times they have been away from each other (but it might just be my impression), but I'm sure they are together 90% of the time as they have the same schedule.🤗
